subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit considered problematic
msgSnippet: Let me try that again. public int add(int addend, int augend) { // .... } ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that
messageBody:
Let me try that again.

public int add(int addend, int augend) {
// ....
}

>}
>
>:)
>
>>So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 4/2/2003 --------------------
>>> Testing of the code (methods) can be done with precondition,
>>> invartiants and postconditions (the contracts).
>>
>>To facilitate the discussion, could you just write a small example? I
>>propose:
>>
>> public int addition(int arg1, int arg2) {
>> /* ... */
>> }
>>
>>-Vladimir
>>
